column5: How are the road conditions on the 502 17 and 102 towards Ear Falls? Last year all were in good shape. The only slow down was on the causeway leaving Fort Frances. Thanks!
All highways are good to ear falls. Road construction from ear falls north to red lake for most of the summer.
Thanks Teddi!! For us south of the border folks its great to have the "local scoop" . Have a great year!

On highway 17 east of Dryden, there has been road grinding-resurfacing going on for the last week or so. Have not heard how far they are going. It has only been a 5-10 minute delay, for those heading to the Sioux Lookout, Ignace areas.

Have been taking the 502 for the past 20+ years and the only problem was 10 -12 years ago on the way home when two semi trucks had an accident totally blocking the road at about the halfway point. Ended up going back around to the 71 amd south. We got to the boarder about the time the 502 opened back up. What a long ride home that was.
